title: How to Make Molasses Spice Cookies

steps.headline: Spread 1/2 cup sugar in a shallow dish and set it aside.
Whisk flour, baking soda, spices, pepper, and salt together in a large bowl and put aside.
Beat together butter, brown sugar, and 1/3 cup sugar in a large bowl, using a mixer at medium speed.
When light and fluffy, beat in the egg yolk and vanilla until combined.
Slowly mix in flour mixture until combined.
Using wet hands, roll two tablespoons at a time of dough into balls.
Put them onto two parchment lined pans and bake for 10-12 minutes.

text: Preheat the oven to 375ºF.  Spread 1/2 cup sugar in a shallow dish and set it aside.  Whisk flour, baking soda, spices, pepper, and salt together in a large bowl and put aside.  Beat together butter, brown sugar, and 1/3 cup sugar in a large bowl, using a mixer at medium speed.  When light and fluffy, beat in the egg yolk and vanilla until combined.  Beat in Molasses for 30 seconds.  Slowly mix in flour mixture until combined.  Using wet hands, roll two tablespoons at a time of dough into balls.  Put them onto two parchment lined pans and bake for 10-12 minutes.  Let cool for 10 minutes.  Serve!
